scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run lint && ./docker/start_with_tests.sh
scripts.test-localdb: npm run clean && npm run lint && jest -i --coverage --detectOpenHandles
scripts.offline: npm run clean && npm run lint && export SLS_DEBUG=* && sls offline start --verbose --port 8080
scripts.offline-win: npm run clean && npm run lint && sls offline start --port 8080
scripts.test-win-localdb: npm run clean && npm run lint && jest -i --coverage --detectOpenHandles
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run lint && sls package
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run lint && serverless deploy --aws-s3-accelerate
